_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
mn76:7.1+mn76:19.1^who_else_mentioned: Sandaka, Ājīvaka, the Blessed One, Buddha
before^mn76:35-42.1^who_around: a large assembly of around five hundred wanderers
before^mn76:35-42.1^where: Kosambi, in Ghosita's Monastery, at the cave of the wavy leaf fig tree, Devakata Pool
where: Kosambi, in Ghosita's Monastery, at the cave of the wavy leaf fig tree, Devakata Pool
mn76:53.3+mn76:53.6^who_else_mentioned: Ānanda, Nanda Vaccha, Kisa Saṅkicca, Makkhali Gosāla
before^mn76:54.2^who_mentioned: Nanda Vaccha, Kisa Saṅkicca, and Makkhali Gosāla
